dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3485 IH: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate certain requirements relating to the award of construction subcontracts within the county or State of performance.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich (for himself, Mr. Cole, Ms. Tokuda, Mr. Stauber, Ms. Davids of Kansas, Mr. Wittman, and Mr. Case) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Act to eliminate certain requirements relating to the award of construction subcontracts within the county or State of performance.

section.header: Elimination of requirement relating to award of construction subcontracts within county or State of performance
section.text: Paragraph (11) of section 8(a) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 637(a)) is repealed.
